item.title: Emma Thompson Says Donald Trump Asked Her Out on a Date: ‘I Could Have Changed the Course of American History!’

item.title: Joanna Bacon, British Actress Known for ‘Love Actually’ and ‘Breeders,’ Dies at 72
item.description: Bacon’s death was confirmed by the Harlow Theatre Company this week, who said she passed away on June 14 following a battle with cancer.
